<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Start a support access session (act as target user)"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/admin/support-access/requests"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Creates a short-lived support session and returns a delegated token that acts as the target user, with actor metadata.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["lawFirmId","targetUserId","reason","ttlMinutes"],"properties":{"lawFirmId":{"type":"string"},"targetUserId":{"type":"string"},"reason":{"type":"string","minLength":5},"ttlMinutes":{"type":"integer","minimum":5,"maximum":120,"default":30},"scopes":{"type":"array","description":"Optional scope narrowing for delegated token; omit to inherit target user's effective scopes.","items":{"type":"string"}}},"title":"StartSupportAccessRequest"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"201":{"description":"Created","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"session":{"type":"object","properties":{"id":{"type":"string"},"lawFirmId":{"type":"string"},"targetUserId":{"type":"string"},"actorAdminUserId":{"type":"string"},"startedAt":{"type":"string","format":"date-time"},"expiresAt":{"type":"string","format":"date-time"},"status":{"type":"string","enum":["active","revoked","expired"]}},"title":"SupportAccessSession"},"delegatedToken":{"type":"string","description":"JWT to use in Authorization: Bearer <delegatedToken>.\nSHOULD include claims like:\n- sub = targetUserId (acting as)\n- act = { \"actorUserId\": \"<adminId>\" } (who is acting)\n- ctx = { \"lawFirmId\": \"<firm>\" } (tenant context)\n- scope = limited scopes (if provided)\n- act_as = true (flag)\n"},"uiSwitchUrl":{"type":"string","description":"Optional convenience link for SPA to switch into support mode with this delegated token."}},"title":"StartSupportAccessResponse"}}}},"400":{"description":"Error payload","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"code":{"type":"string"},"message":{"type":"string"},"details":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"field":{"type":"string"},"message":{"type":"string"}}}},"requestId":{"type":"string"}},"required":["code","message"],"title":"ErrorResponse"}}}},"403":{"description":"Error payload","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"code":{"type":"string"},"message":{"type":"string"},"details":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"field":{"type":"string"},"message":{"type":"string"}}}},"requestId":{"type":"string"}},"required":["code","message"],"title":"ErrorResponse"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
